txt.en: 'Stay and be welcome, but bring no strife to this place of tranquility, or our displeasure will be apparent and swift.'
'Our time is short, but until the others leave, I will keep the watch.'
'I am the voice that ensures the peace, while my brothers and sisters continue their reflections.'
'Have you come here for reflection, or is your purpose here less than tranquil?'
'If you have come here for assistance, speak with one of the attendants.'
